item.title: Quoting Sal Khan
item.description: AI creates an education challenge, not just a job crisis. We haven't built systems to help people to continue learning and connect them to new opportunities.

item.title: The AI Attribution Error
item.description: If an AI produces something useful it's because of your own skill in model choice, prompting, and steering. If not, it's because the model is a useless lying machine that can't follow directions.
